name: LIVE: Devotion!
description:
Lovegod bestows the uneasy task of proving your devotion and bringing him onto the mortal plane by sacrificing the souls of 5000 virgins! Are you comitted enough to do it?

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2: https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-8

The theme was "Youre not alone" so i made a game about amassing a fanbase and then sacrificing it to your one and only true love <3

If you enjoy this i would highly appreciate if you recommended it to some other people, thanks!

Note: works on mobile but not tested/designed for it.

Note 2: if the web version experiences performance issues please download the desktop version provided below.
